DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal study determine atomoxetine treatment improve selective cognitive function abstinent cocaine user , compare healthy control . The study also test functional variation NET promoter polymorphic region ( NETpPR ) moderate cognitive effect atomoxetine .
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Effects Atomoxetine Humans : Genetic Moderators
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , placebo-controlled , crossover study , cocaine use ( cocaine user vs. healthy control ) NET AAGG4 status ( L4/ L4 vs. L4/S4 S4/ S4 genotype ) between-subject factor . Similar previous study , propose compare individual two copy L4 allele participant least one S4 allele less two percent general population homozygous S4 allele . Forty cocaine user 40 healthy control participate 3 test session , assign 40 mg atomoxetine , 80 mg atomoxetine , placebo . Outcome measure include physiological , subjective , cognitive performance measure . To date study 35 completers currently data analysis . ( December 2014 )
DOC.criteria: Male female , age 21 50 ; No current dependence abuse drug abuse alcohol ( except tobacco ) ; No current medical problem normal ECG ; For woman , pregnant determine pregnancy screen breast feeding , use acceptable birth control method . Current major psychiatric illness include mood , psychotic , anxiety disorder ; History major medical illness ; include liver disease , heart disease , medical condition physician investigator deems contraindicate subject study ; Known allergy Atomoxetine ; Use Monoamine Oxidase inhibitor within last month ( clinically Atomoxetine administration contraindicate within 2 week discontinuation Monoamine oxidase inhibitor therapy ) .
